Used to bring me joy to play with friends. After hundreds of sad hours of in low trust factor silver I give up. If you take this game seriously you are missing the point. Ranking up is a waste of time. Play the game to have fun i guess but it really isn't fun when you get down to it. I have spent hundreds of dollars on skins and cases played in the higher ranks and played in the lower ranks but this game sucks.
Recomendado por se buen juego jaja
o jogo e otimo mas e muito pesado

I love first person games and this one right here has all the features I'm looking for in a game. Good graphics, incredible weapons skins and really smooth playing.  You can also build very nice strategies with your team in order to win. It's awesome.
